text:
I have a question while researching HubSpot's <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/certification-requirements|Getting certified in the App Marketplace>?
The article requires Your app must not include a browser extension or use similar means to inject capabilities or components into HubSpot's UI.
Officially supported UI extensions (e.g. CRM cards and custom workflow actions) provide more consistent user experiences for customers
Is the following practice allowed?
I submitted my App for listing but I have not heard back (publish status shows as 'draft', but there are 9 installs - not sure if the app has been listed or not?).
